' this logic must be called from the Aras scheduling service (server side) ' on every sunday of the week ' ' it will read identity "Time Sheet Auto Create Weekly" and create and submit ' weekly time sheets for each member listed ' 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator()
Dim AutoCreateIdentity As Item = inn.getItemByKeyedName("Identity","Time Sheet Auto Create Weekly") If AutoCreateIdentity.isError() Then Return Me 'nothing to do
Dim AutoCreateMembers As Item = inn.newItem("Member","get") AutoCreateMembers.setAttribute("select","source_id(keyed_name),related_id(keyed_name)") AutoCreateMembers.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") AutoCreateMembers.setProperty("source_id",AutoCreateIdentity.GetID())
AutoCreateMembers = AutoCreateMembers.apply() If AutoCreateMembers.isError() Then Return Me 'nothing to do
Dim dtNow As DateTime = System.DateTime.UtcNow Dim thisWeekNumber As Integer = DatePart("ww", dtNow) Dim thisYear As Integer = DatePart("yyyy", dtNow)
' week number seems 1 off - compared to outlook calendar weeks thisWeekNumber = thisWeekNumber - 1
Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity)
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To AutoCreateMembers.getItemCount()-1 Dim relatedIdentity As Item = AutoCreateMembers.getItemByIndex(i).getRelatedItem() Dim MemberName As String = relatedIdentity.getProperty("keyed_name","")
Dim timeSheetName As String = thisYear & "week" & thisWeekNumber & " - " & MemberName
Dim timeSheet As Item = inn.newItem("Time Sheet","merge") timeSheet.setAttribute("where","[Time_Sheet].name='" & timeSheetName & "'") timeSheet.setProperty("name",timeSheetName) ' set member to owner of time sheet timeSheet.setProperty("owned_by_id",AutoCreateMembers.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("related_id",""))
timeSheet = timeSheet.apply()
If Not timeSheet.isError() Then ' promote to "Active" timeSheet.setAction("promoteItem") timeSheet.setProperty("state","Active") timeSheet = timeSheet.apply() End If
Next i
If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If
Return inn.newResult("New Time Sheets for week:" & thisWeekNumber & " got created")
